name: Glowfish (itch)
description:
Included is both the source code and the playable Windows executable of the game, note that the game was heavily modded and ported to android after this version after the graphics were toned down for performance gains. The mobile version of the game can be found on the Google Play store through the following link below.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mosscrow.speedsnake

The game was created using the Godot engine and the core game was developed in under 7 days, porting to mobile was a slightly harder challenge along with implementing ads etc.

You can use the Godot editor to play around with the code and modify it for yourself!

https://godotengine.org/download

The Godot Game engine does not require an install or an account and is completely free to use
